masterGrammar.rule: rule {NP option 0 - not possessed} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> = - <NP head possessor head agr> = none <NP option> = 0

rule {NP option 0Asuf - not possessed, absolutive_suffix} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> = - <NP head possessor head agr> = none <NP head type suffix absolutive> = - | if +, possessor required <NP option> = 0Asuf

rule {NP option 0Apre - not possessed, absolutive_prefix} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> = - <NP head possessor head agr> = none <NP head type prefix absolutive> = - | if +, possessor required <NP option> = 0Apre

rule {NP option 0p - possessed with person affix, pro-drop} NP = {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head type possessed> <= + <NP head type genitive_PP> = - | to restrict possessor w/ gen PP <NP head possessor> == ~[agr:none] <NP option> = 0p

rule {NP option 1a - no marker, possessor initial} NP = {DP / Pron} {N'' / N'} <NP head> = <N'' head> <NP head> = <N' head> <NP head possessor> <= <DP> <NP head possessor> <= <Pron> <NP head type possessed> <= + <NP head type genitive_PP> = - | to restrict possessor w/ gen PP <DP head type quantifier> = - <DP head case> = genitive <Pron head case> = genitive <Pron head type possessive> = - | not stand alone possessive <NP head type wh> <= <Pron head type wh> <NP option> = 1a

rule {NP option 7a - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/ optional partitive PP after} NP = {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg} (PP) <NP head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - | these use DP rule "Pron" <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <NP head> = <Dem head> <NP head> = <Q head> <NP head> = <Num head> <NP head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Q head type quantifier> = + <Num head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - | so "which" not separate <PP head type stranded> = - | PP must have overt complement <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP | <PP head type partitive> = + <NP head type prefix poss> = - |can't be possessors <NP head type suffix poss> = - |can't be possessors <Pron head> == ~[case:genitive] <NP option> = 7a

rule {NP option 7b - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/ optional partitive PP before} NP = (PP) {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg} <NP head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - | these use DP rule "Pron" <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <NP head> = <Dem head> <NP head> = <Q head> <NP head> = <Num head> <NP head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Q head type quantifier> = + <Num head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - | so "which" not separate <PP head type stranded> = - | PP must have overt complement <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP | <PP head type partitive> = + <NP head type prefix poss> = - |can't be possessors <NP head type suffix poss> = - |can't be possessors <Pron head> == ~[case:genitive] <NP option> = 7b

rule {NBarBar option 1 - QPs initial} N'' = QP N' <N'' head> = <N' head> <QP head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP head type DP-initial> = + <N'' head type prefix> <= <QP head type prefix> <N'' head type wh> <= <QP head type wh> <N'' option> = 1

rule {NBarBar option 2 - QPs final} N'' = N' QP <N'' head> = <N' head> <QP head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP head type DP-final> = + <N'' head type suffix> <= <QP head type suffix> <N'' head type wh> <= <QP head type wh> <N'' option> = 2

rule {NBarBar option 3whI - QPs both sides, wh initial} N'' = QP_1 N' QP_2 <N'' head> = <N' head> <QP_1 head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP_2 head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP_1 head type DP-initial> = + <QP_2 head type DP-final> = + <N'' head type prefix> <= <QP_1 head type prefix> <N'' head type suffix> <= <QP_2 head type suffix> <N'' head type wh> <= <QP_1 head type wh> <N'' option> = 3whI

rule {NBarBar option 3whF - QPs both sides, wh final} N'' = QP_1 N' QP_2 <N'' head> = <N' head> <QP_1 head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP_2 head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP_1 head type DP-initial> = + <QP_2 head type DP-final> = + <N'' head type prefix> <= <QP_1 head type prefix> <N'' head type suffix> <= <QP_2 head type suffix> <N'' head type wh> <= <QP_2 head type wh> <N'' option> = 3whF

rule {NBarBar option 3whagr - QPs both sides, wh agree} N'' = QP_1 N' QP_2 <N'' head> = <N' head> <QP_1 head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP_2 head agr> = <N' head agr> <QP_1 head type DP-initial> = + <QP_2 head type DP-final> = + <QP_1 head type wh> = <QP_2 head type wh> <N'' head type wh> <= <QP_1 head type wh> <N'' head type prefix> <= <QP_1 head type prefix> <N'' head type suffix> <= <QP_2 head type suffix> <N'' option> = 3whagr

rule {NBar option 1a - AdjP initial, recursive} N'_1 = AdjP N'_2 <N'_1 head> = <N'_2 head> <AdjP head agr> = <N'_2 head agr> <AdjP head case> = <N'_2 head case> <AdjP head type DP-initial> = + <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <AdjP head type clausal-comp> = - <N'_1 head type prefix> <= <AdjP head type prefix> | N case marking can be overridden by AdjP, if AdjP also marked then another modifier required. <N' option> = 1a

rule {NBar option 1b - AdjP final, recursive} N'_1 = N'_2 AdjP <N'_1 head> = <N'_2 head> <AdjP head agr> = <N'_2 head agr> <AdjP head case> = <N'_2 head case> <AdjP head type DP-final> = + <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <AdjP head type clausal-comp> = - <N'_1 head type suffix> <= <AdjP head type suffix> | N case marking can be overridden by AdjP, if AdjP also marked then another modifier required. <N' option> = 1b
rule {NBar option 1aPart - participle initial, recursive} N'_1 = VP N'_2 <N'_1 head> = <N'_2 head> <VP head type participle> = + <N' option> = 1aPart
rule {NBar option 1bPart - participle final, recursive} N'_1 = N'_2 VP <N'_1 head> = <N'_2 head> <VP head type participle> = + <N' option> = 1bPart
rule {NBar option 2a - left-most noun head} N' = N_1 (N_2 (N_3)) <N' head> = <N_1 head> <N_2 head type prefix poss> = - <N_3 head type prefix poss> = - <N' option> = 2a

rule {NBar option 2b - left-most noun head, PP initial} N' = PP N_1 (N_2 (N_3)) <N' head> = <N_1 head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <N_2 head type prefix poss> = - <N_3 head type prefix poss> = - <N' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <PP head> == ~[case:genitive] <N' option> = 2b

rule {NBar option 4bnotabs - no compounds, PP initial} N' = PP N <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <N' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <PP head> == ~[case:absolutive] <N' option> = 4bnotabs

rule {NBar option 4babs - no compounds, absolutive PP initial} N' = PP N <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <PP head case> = absolutive <N' head type absolutive_PP> = + | to restrict cooccurrence w/ possessor <N' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <N' option> = 4babs

rule {NBar option 4e - no compounds, PP final} N' = N PP <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <N' head type suffix poss> <= <PP head type suffix poss> <PP head> == ~[case:genitive] <N' option> = 4e

rule {NBar option 4egen - no compounds, genitive PP final} N' = N PP <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <PP head case> = genitive <N' head type genitive_PP> = + | to restrict cooccurrence w/ possessor <N' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <N' option> = 4egen

rule {NBar option 4enoterg - no compounds, PP final} N' = N PP <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <N' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <PP head> == ~[case:ergative] <N' option> = 4enoterg

rule {NBar option 4eerg - no compounds, ergative PP final} N' = N PP <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <PP head case> = ergative <N' head type ergative_PP> = + | to restrict cooccurrence w/ possessor <N' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <N' option> = 4eerg

rule {NBar option 4enotabs - no compounds, PP final} N' = N PP <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <N' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <PP head> == ~[case:absolutive] <N' option> = 4enotabs

rule {NBar option 4eabs - no compounds, absolutive PP final} N' = N PP <N' head> = <N head> <PP head type stranded> = - | P must have overt complement <PP head type passive> = - | by-phrase not within NP <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP <PP head case> = absolutive <N' head type absolutive_PP> = + | to restrict cooccurrence w/ possessor <N' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <N' option> = 4eabs

rule {NBar option 5a - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/o head noun (optional PP after)} N' = {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg} (PP) <N' head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - | these use DP rule "Pron" <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <N' head> = <Dem head> <N' head> = <Q head> <N' head> = <Num head> <N' head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - | so "which" not separate <PP head type stranded> = - | PP must have overt complement <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP | <PP head type partitive> = + <N' head type prefix poss> = - |can't be possessors <N' head type suffix poss> = - |can't be possessors <Pron head> == ~[case:genitive] <N' option> = 5a

rule {NBar option 5b - pronoun,dem,quantifiers w/o head noun (optional PP before)} N' = (PP) {Pron / Dem / Q / Num / Deg} <N' head> = <Pron head> <Pron head type possessive> = - | these use DP rule "Pron" <Pron head type reflexive> = - <Pron head type reciprocal> = - <N' head> = <Dem head> <N' head> = <Q head> <N' head> = <Num head> <N' head> = <Deg head> <Deg head type quantifier> = + <Dem head type wh > = - | so "which" not separate <PP head type stranded> = - | PP must have overt complement <PP head type sentential> = - | sentential not within NP | <PP head type partitive> = + <N' head type prefix poss> = - |can't be possessors <N' head type suffix poss> = - |can't be possessors <Pron head> == ~[case:genitive] <N' option> = 5b
rule {NBar option Part - participle (phrase) as NBar} N' = VP <N' head> = <VP head> <VP head type participle> = +
